1 import numpy as np
2 import math
3 
4 __all__ = [
5  'concatenate_matrices',
6  'euler_matrix',
7  'euler_from_matrix',
8  'euler_from_quaternion',
9  'quaternion_matrix',
10  'quaternion_from_euler',
11 ]
12 
13 # epsilon for testing whether a number is close to zero
14 _EPS = np.finfo(float).eps * 4.0
15 
16 # axis sequences for Euler angles
17 _NEXT_AXIS = [1, 2, 0, 1]
18 
19 # map axes strings to/from tuples of inner axis, parity, repetition, frame
20 _AXES2TUPLE = {
21  'sxyz': (0, 0, 0, 0),
22  'sxyx': (0, 0, 1, 0),
23  'sxzy': (0, 1, 0, 0),
24  'sxzx': (0, 1, 1, 0),
25  'syzx': (1, 0, 0, 0),
26  'syzy': (1, 0, 1, 0),
27  'syxz': (1, 1, 0, 0),
28  'syxy': (1, 1, 1, 0),
29  'szxy': (2, 0, 0, 0),
30  'szxz': (2, 0, 1, 0),
31  'szyx': (2, 1, 0, 0),
32  'szyz': (2, 1, 1, 0),
33  'rzyx': (0, 0, 0, 1),
34  'rxyx': (0, 0, 1, 1),
35  'ryzx': (0, 1, 0, 1),
36  'rxzx': (0, 1, 1, 1),
37  'rxzy': (1, 0, 0, 1),
38  'ryzy': (1, 0, 1, 1),
39  'rzxy': (1, 1, 0, 1),
40  'ryxy': (1, 1, 1, 1),
41  'ryxz': (2, 0, 0, 1),
42  'rzxz': (2, 0, 1, 1),
43  'rxyz': (2, 1, 0, 1),
44  'rzyz': (2, 1, 1, 1)
45 }
46 
47 _TUPLE2AXES = dict((v, k) for k, v in _AXES2TUPLE.items())
48 
49 
50 def concatenate_matrices(*matrices):
51  M = np.identity(4)
52  for i in matrices:
53  M = np.dot(M, i)
54  return M
55 
56 
57 def normalize_quaterion(quaternion, tolerance=0.00001):
58  use_numpy = isinstance(quaternion, np.ndarray)
59  mag2 = sum(n * n for n in quaternion)
60  if mag2 <= tolerance:
61  return quaternion
62  mag = math.sqrt(mag2)
63  normalized_quaternion = tuple(n / mag for n in quaternion)
64  if use_numpy:
65  normalized_quaternion = np.array(normalized_quaternion)
66  return normalized_quaternion
67 
68 
69 def euler_matrix(ai, aj, ak, axes='sxyz'):
70  try:
71  firstaxis, parity, repetition, frame = _AXES2TUPLE[axes]
72  except (AttributeError, KeyError):
73  _ = _TUPLE2AXES[axes]
74  firstaxis, parity, repetition, frame = axes
75 
76  i = firstaxis
77  j = _NEXT_AXIS[i + parity]
78  k = _NEXT_AXIS[i - parity + 1]
79 
80  if frame:
81  ai, ak = ak, ai
82  if parity:
83  ai, aj, ak = -ai, -aj, -ak
84 
85  si, sj, sk = math.sin(ai), math.sin(aj), math.sin(ak)
86  ci, cj, ck = math.cos(ai), math.cos(aj), math.cos(ak)
87  cc, cs = ci * ck, ci * sk
88  sc, ss = si * ck, si * sk
89 
90  M = np.identity(4)
91  if repetition:
92  M[i, i] = cj
93  M[i, j] = sj * si
94  M[i, k] = sj * ci
95  M[j, i] = sj * sk
96  M[j, j] = -cj * ss + cc
97  M[j, k] = -cj * cs - sc
98  M[k, i] = -sj * ck
99  M[k, j] = cj * sc + cs
100  M[k, k] = cj * cc - ss
101  else:
102  M[i, i] = cj * ck
103  M[i, j] = sj * sc - cs
104  M[i, k] = sj * cc + ss
105  M[j, i] = cj * sk
106  M[j, j] = sj * ss + cc
107  M[j, k] = sj * cs - sc
108  M[k, i] = -sj
109  M[k, j] = cj * si
110  M[k, k] = cj * ci
111  return M
112 
113 
114 def euler_from_matrix(matrix, axes='sxyz'):
115  try:
116  firstaxis, parity, repetition, frame = _AXES2TUPLE[axes.lower()]
117  except (AttributeError, KeyError):
118  _ = _TUPLE2AXES[axes]
119  firstaxis, parity, repetition, frame = axes
120 
121  i = firstaxis
122  j = _NEXT_AXIS[i + parity]
123  k = _NEXT_AXIS[i - parity + 1]
124 
125  M = np.array(matrix, dtype=np.float64, copy=False)[:3, :3]
126  if repetition:
127  sy = math.sqrt(M[i, j] * M[i, j] + M[i, k] * M[i, k])
128  if sy > _EPS:
129  ax = math.atan2(M[i, j], M[i, k])
130  ay = math.atan2(sy, M[i, i])
131  az = math.atan2(M[j, i], -M[k, i])
132  else:
133  ax = math.atan2(-M[j, k], M[j, j])
134  ay = math.atan2(sy, M[i, i])
135  az = 0.0
136  else:
137  cy = math.sqrt(M[i, i] * M[i, i] + M[j, i] * M[j, i])
138  if cy > _EPS:
139  ax = math.atan2(M[k, j], M[k, k])
140  ay = math.atan2(-M[k, i], cy)
141  az = math.atan2(M[j, i], M[i, i])
142  else:
143  ax = math.atan2(-M[j, k], M[j, j])
144  ay = math.atan2(-M[k, i], cy)
145  az = 0.0
146 
147  if parity:
148  ax, ay, az = -ax, -ay, -az
149  if frame:
150  ax, az = az, ax
151  return ax, ay, az
152 
153 
154 def euler_from_quaternion(quaternion, axes='sxyz'):
155  return euler_from_matrix(quaternion_matrix(quaternion), axes)
156 
157 
158 def quaternion_matrix(quaternion):
159  q = np.array(quaternion[:4], dtype=np.float64, copy=True)
160  q = normalize_quaterion(q)
161  nq = np.dot(q, q)
162  if nq < _EPS:
163  return np.identity(4)
164  q *= math.sqrt(2.0 / nq)
165  q = np.outer(q, q)
166  return np.array(
167  (
168  (1.0 - q[1, 1] - q[2, 2], 0.0 + q[0, 1] - q[2, 3], 0.0 + q[0, 2] + q[1, 3], 0.0),
169  (0.0 + q[0, 1] + q[2, 3], 1.0 - q[0, 0] - q[2, 2], 0.0 + q[1, 2] - q[0, 3], 0.0),
170  (0.0 + q[0, 2] - q[1, 3], 0.0 + q[1, 2] + q[0, 3], 1.0 - q[0, 0] - q[1, 1], 0.0),
171  (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0),
172  ),
173  dtype=np.float64,
174  )
175 
176 
177 def quaternion_from_euler(ai, aj, ak, axes='sxyz'):
178  try:
179  firstaxis, parity, repetition, frame = _AXES2TUPLE[axes.lower()]
180  except (AttributeError, KeyError):
181  _ = _TUPLE2AXES[axes]
182  firstaxis, parity, repetition, frame = axes
183 
184  i = firstaxis
185  j = _NEXT_AXIS[i + parity]
186  k = _NEXT_AXIS[i - parity + 1]
187 
188  if frame:
189  ai, ak = ak, ai
190  if parity:
191  aj = -aj
192 
193  ai /= 2.0
194  aj /= 2.0
195  ak /= 2.0
196  ci = math.cos(ai)
197  si = math.sin(ai)
198  cj = math.cos(aj)
199  sj = math.sin(aj)
200  ck = math.cos(ak)
201  sk = math.sin(ak)
202  cc = ci * ck
203  cs = ci * sk
204  sc = si * ck
205  ss = si * sk
206 
207  quaternion = np.empty((4, ), dtype=np.float64)
208  if repetition:
209  quaternion[i] = cj * (cs + sc)
210  quaternion[j] = sj * (cc + ss)
211  quaternion[k] = sj * (cs - sc)
212  quaternion[3] = cj * (cc - ss)
213  else:
214  quaternion[i] = cj * sc - sj * cs
215  quaternion[j] = cj * ss + sj * cc
216  quaternion[k] = cj * cs - sj * sc
217  quaternion[3] = cj * cc + sj * ss
218  if parity:
219  quaternion[j] *= -1
220 
221  return normalize_quaterion(quaternion)
222 
223 
224 def euclidian_dist(point_a, point_b):
225  return np.linalg.norm(np.array(point_a) - np.array(point_b))
